CustomField.description: This field store the note to be displayed on Surcharge Exemption request before its submitted for Approval for Sales manager
CustomField.formula: "In accordance with the policy any surcharge exemption application will be sent to Sales Director, Sales GM and Head of Commercial for approval, click Save if you wish to proceed." & BR() & BR() & "Please also note that our Freight Services Pricing Policy dictates that surcharges should be charged at standard rates and it should not be treated as a negotiation lever." & BR() & BR() & "Approved surcharge exemptions will be collated and reported to Parcel, Post & eCommerce Services EGM on a regular basis."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field store the note to be displayed on Surcharge Exemption request before its submitted for Approval for Sales manager
CustomField.label: Note:
